name: tin
detailedDescription:
'SPAM!'
It's an easy-open canned meat container - a leftover from an email marketing training course a few years ago.
It says 'best before end: November 2015.'
I thought this stuff lasted forever!

inventory.name: spam
inventory.detailedDescription: Processed meat. How bad can it be? Right?

attributes.smell:
It reminds you of something.
You wonder to yourself if cats like Spam.
attributes.taste: It tastes a lot like it smells.
